channel.title: CVE Feed for orchidsoftware -- platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for orchidsoftware -- platform

item.title: CVE-2020-15263|2024-08-04T13:15:20.026Z -- orchidsoftware -- platform
item.description: In platform before version 9.4.4, inline attributes are not properly escaped. If the data that came from users was not escaped, then an XSS vulnerability is possible. The issue was introduced in 9.0.0 and fixed in 9.4.4.
